item.title: The grass has not been cut since months in Vicarage Grove, 22nd July
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Vicarage Grove, Camberwell, London

item.title: 1 abandoned old sofa in front of lift on ground floor blocking lift 2 boxes left on 3rd floor by lifts, 22nd July
item.description:
